name: Elton John: FishCrustCrusaders
description:
EltonJohn: FishCrustCrusaders was developed for the class of Applied Game Development in the 2nd year of the Bachelor in Digital Games Development Engineering in IPCA. This game is a 3D Tower Defense, where besides defending, you're also attacking.

You're Elton John. Your dream is to solve every piece of mystery that exists in the world. But, the thing that you always wanted to find the most, is Atlantis.

When you arrive there, you'll find yourself in the middle of a political mess, you also fall in love at first sight. You gotta work with the natives to protect the various islands from being attacked but also attacking the enemies camp to rescue the princess who was kidnapped. Can you save the love your life and live happily ever after?
